root: ^Are you still training at this hour Yuki? You will overwork yourself if you do it too much. You should get some sleep.
^Oh! Hey Claire! Don't worry I'm fine. My parents showed me how to train without having to overextend my body, I'll be fine, wanna join me? I'm sure you'd be great at it!
^I think I'll pass... But tell me Yuki I thought that you were adopted.  Why are you calling them your parents are they not just your caretakers?
^Nah I don't see it like that. We might have been different species and not be blood-related, but they are my parents to me.
^I see, it's not something normal to Nobles that's for sure.
^Really? Are bloodlines that important to you?
^Not to me per se, but I still find it weird that you call those persons your parents. Would you not prefer to meet your real parents?
^Nah, those people abandoned me for a reason, it might be a good one or a bad one, but I personally don't care. I love them as my parents even if we are not related!
^You are smiling brightly when you talk about them... must be nice.
^You have family problems don't you? So should try to find your own family!
^I do not think I can... I wish to rebuild my name as a Noble. For that, I don't think I will have that luxury.
^That's so sad Claire... Hey, I'm gonna visit someplace I like soon, wanna come with me when I do? I'm sure you will like it!
^If you say it with that much enthusiasm I might take you one that offer, if I have time.
